text:
This #WorldHealthDay, we express our gratitude to #healthcare workers who are battling #COVID19 relentlessly and urge everyone to follow precautions and get #vaccinated!

So, today our #WeeklyHebrewWord is חיסון | Chisun | खिसून meaning #VACCINE | टीका (Teeka)💉

Stay #Healthy! https://t.co/IHF6I0w0uz
